name: Untitled Skateboarding Game
description:
This is a hypercasual or arcade skateboarding game that I have been working on from sometime, you play as Remy the skateboarder by collecting helmets you generate more players behind you to give you speed!

Make sure to avoid all sorts of traps along the away or else you will lose the skater clones!

You can download the current prototype from here and try it for yourself!
